name: Political Regime - OWID based on Polity IV and Wimmer & Min
title: Political Regime - OWID based on Polity IV and Wimmer & Min
description: Polity 2 Measure ranges from -10 (autocracy) to +10 (full democracy). If a country was colonized in a given year is encoded as -20. In cases in which there was data from both Min and Wimmer and also Polity IV the Polity IV data is shown.

sources.name: Political Regime (OWID based on Polity IV and Wimmer & Min)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Our World In Data combined two datasets: Wimmer and Min (2006) for information on whether a country was colonized; Center for Systemic Peace for a measure of the political regime.
sources.additionalInfo: Polity 2 Measure ranges from -10 (autocracy) to +10 (full democracy). If a country was colonized in a given year is encoded as -20. In cases in which there was data from both Min and Wimmer and also Polity IV the Polity IV data is shown.

fields.name: Political Regime (OWID based on Polity IV and Wimmer & Min)
